extension.summary: Quickly see which of your favorite shows are on next, and browse episode lists.
extension.description: Search and save a list of your favorite shows to be automatically updated and sorted by what's on next and highlighted for what's on today and tomorrow. Shows next and previous episode details. Select a show to browse an episode list. Select an episode for a summary.
